titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Gospel sheet music, 1937-1970
titlepage.publisher:
Department of Special Collections and University Archives
Stanford University Libraries
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 2002 The Board of Trustees of Stanford University. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

did.abstract: Contains sheet music published primarily in Chicago, Illinois from the 1930's through 1970.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Gospel sheet music. MISC 1058. Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content Summary
scopecontent.p: Contains sheet music published primarily in Chicago, Illinois from the 1930's through 1970.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: African Americans--Music.
African Americans--Social life and customs.
Gospel music--United States.
Popular culture--United States.

did.unittitle: Boddie, Sylvia. Meeting tonight on the old camp ground. -- Chicaco, Ill. : Sylvia Bodie Music Studio, 1948
Brewster, Rev. W. Herbert. Make more room for Jesus in your life / arranged by W.O. Hoyle. -- Chicago, Ill. : Bowles Music House, 1947
Brown, Rev. W.D. and W. Morganfield. I surrender / arrangement by Kenneth Morris. -- Shreveport, LA : SU-MA Publishing Co., Inc., 1970
Coleman, Mary Lou. When sets the evening sun / arrangements by Virginia Davies. -- Chicago, Ill. : Theodore R. Frye Publishers, 1948
Dorsey, Thomas A. I'm just a sinner saved by grace. -- Chicago, Ill. : Thomas A. Dorsey Music Publisher, 1937
Dorsey, Thomas A. Thank you all the days of my life. -- Chicago, Ill. : Thomas A. Dorsey Music Publisher, 1946
George, Cassietta. Ready to serve the lord / arranged by Kenneth Morris. -- Chicago, Ill. : Martin & Morris Music, Inc., 1961
Hollins, M. I come to praise him / arranged by Kenneth Morris. -- Chicago, Ill. : Martin & Morris Music, Inc., 1968
Morris, Kenneth. He answers me. -- Chicago, Ill. : Martin & Morris Music, Inc., 1946
Morris, Kenneth. Is it well with your soul? -- Chicago, Ill. : Martin & Morris Music, Inc., 1946
Morris, Kenneth. Jesus is the ruler of my life. -- Chicago, Ill. : Martin & Morris Music, Inc., 1944
Morris, Kenneth. Most of all I'm going home to see my lord. -- Chicago, Ill. : Martin & Morris Music, Inc., 1948
Morris, Kenneth. When I join the jubilee. -- Chicago, Ill. : Martin & Morris Music, Inc., 1948
Pace, Charles A. Hide my soul. -- Pittsburgh, Penn. : The Old Ship of Zion, 1943
Sallie, Martin. Just a few days to labor. -- Chicago, Ill. : Martin & Morris Music, Inc., 1944
